name: Jewel Blast 2020
description:
Have fun in this amazing Jewel's world, Free to crush all the jewels! there are various jewels to accompany you to travel in this wonderland! Try to Challenge the amazing levels!

How To Play:
1、Tap the adjacent Jewels of the same color to eliminate them all
2、The more Jewels you eliminated, the higher score you get
3、Various of booster help you get a high score

Download Now & Let's go blast Jewels and crushing never stop!
